update tbl_permissioninfo
pmsnName = #{pmsnname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
actionName = #{actionname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

updateby = #{updateby,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

remark = #{remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
